mapper.select: select d.id as d_id, d.name as d_name, d.category_id as d_category_id, d.price as d_price, d.image as d_image, d.description as d_description, d.status as d_status, d.update_time as d_update_time, c.name as c_name, f.id as f_id, f.dish_id as f_dish_id, f.name as f_name, f.value as f_value from dish d left join dish_flavor f on d.id = f.dish_id left join category c on d.category_id = c.id where d.category_id = #{categoryId}

select d.id as d_id, d.name as d_name, d.category_id as d_category_id, d.price as d_price, d.image as d_image, d.description as d_description, d.status as d_status, d.update_time as d_update_time, c.name as c_name, f.id as f_id, f.dish_id as f_dish_id, f.name as f_name, f.value as f_value from dish d left join dish_flavor f on d.id = f.dish_id left join category c on d.category_id = c.id where d.category_id = #{categoryId} and d.status = 1
